title: Account got hacked by an unknown person
body: My account got hacked (but they didn't change my password for some reason) and played ranked flex games on my account with some friends they added onto my friends list.  I sent a support request but I wanted to cover as many of my bases as possible.  Is there any way to figure out who / where they accessed my account from?

replies.body:
We consider all of your personal account info sensitive information, so I won't be able to help much on the boards for account recovery. I did go ahead and look into your ticket, and I saw that they've replied since you wrote this post! Also, I won't be able to give out any details on who/where your account was accessed from, as that would be giving out their personal information.

Let me know if that covered everything!
I don't have a reply to my ticket (at least that I can see when I click "my tickets" in the support site).  Is it somewhere else?

You should have gotten an email when they responded with a link to their response. Be sure to double check your email just in case you missed one. 

I also noticed that the status of your ticket been set to solved, so that may be the reason why it wasn't showing up in "my tickets" anymore.
